title: Abby's Souvlaki
ingredients: ['1 lemon, juiced', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1.75kg (4 lb) pork fillet, cut into cubes', '2 medium red onions, cut into large pieces', '2 green peppers, cut into large pieces', 'skewers']
